name: Chicken with Creamy Spinach Sauce
description: Spinach is packed with vitamins and minerals, including vitamin A, vitamin K, iron, folate and potassium – all vital for good health.

ingredients.name: chicken breasts
ingredients.additionalInstruction: butterflied and pounded to a 1/4“ thickness

preparation: Bring Bouillon to a boil in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup.
Stir in spinach and Spinach Dip Mix. Bring to a simmer.
Add cream cheese and milk, stirring until smooth.
Remove from heat. Add Parmesan and stir until melted.
In a large frying pan over medium-high heat, cook chicken for 3-4 minutes per side.
Cover chicken with Creamy Spinach Sauce. Reduce heat to medium.
Cook for an additional 10-15 minutes. Serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with roasted peppers, butternut squash or sauté mushrooms and onions on brown rice.
